channel.title: AI Model on KRS
channel.description: Recent content in AI Model on KRS

item.title: OpenAI
item.description: Leverage OpenAI’s powerful language models to enhance Krs’ problem-solving and recommendation capabilities. Prerequisites Existing Kubernetes cluster: Ensure you have a Kubernetes cluster running locally (e.g., Minikube, etc) or in the cloud (e.g., Amazon EKS, Google Kubernetes Engine, etc), if on the cloud, ensure that you’ve secured a config file, before using KRS. Python 3.6+: KRS is a Python-based tool, so make sure you have Python 3.6 or a later version installed on your system.

item.title: HuggingFace
item.description: Leverage HuggingFace’s powerful language models to enhance Krs’ problem-solving and recommendation capabilities. Prerequisites Existing Kubernetes cluster Ensure you have a Kubernetes cluster running locally (e.g., Minikube, etc) or in the cloud (e.g., Amazon EKS, Google Kubernetes Engine, etc), if on the cloud, ensure that you’ve secured a config file, before using KRS. Python 3.6+: KRS is a Python-based tool, so make sure you have Python 3.6 or a later version installed on your system.
